http://www.newgadgets.de

Hands On of the Packard Bell Liberty Tab 10-Inch Tablet with NVidia Tegra 2 and Android 3.0 Honeycomb
title: Hands On of the Packard Bell Liberty Tab

comments.text: Yeah looks like﻿ the acer, but really like the red cover
comments.author: HGEMAIL

comments.text: Had mine for a few weeks now and am very happy with it. Battery life is good....can get a full day out of it watching movies and playing games. It's very responsive, but the only thing that lets it down is the Android marketplace; it really doesn't compare to the Ios. However, there are apps on Android that cover most of the reqiurements i need, so overall i am happy with﻿ this purchase.
comments.author: TheRedalert7

comments.text: it has a flash on a 5mp cam it﻿ has a nvada dual core processor 10hrs battery life and runs 10.1 flash.
